name: Popeye (Tabletop)
overview: Game-Play: Popeye is also the same game as the Panorama (PG-92). Here you control Popeye left and right. You are on a bridge at the harbour fighting Brutus, who has captured Olive. Your object is to punch Brutus into the Ocean and save Olive. If you capture the can of spinach that Olive kicks down to you Brutus gets punched onto the hook.
